issues.fullMessage: To check the type of an object there are at least three options: the simplest and shortest one uses the "expr is SomeType" operator, the slightly longer "typeInstance.IsInstanceOfType(expr)", and the cumbersome and error-prone one uses "expr1.GetType().IsAssignableFrom(expr2.GetType())"

properties.title: "Type.IsAssignableFrom()" should not be used to check object type
